emerging_technologies.name: Emotionally Intelligent Agents (EIAs)
emerging_technologies.description: Agents capable of understanding and responding to human emotions, providing personalized interactions.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize mental health care by providing continuous support; privacy concerns regarding emotional data collection.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will be driven by the need for personalized customer experiences and mental health support, with challenges around data security and ethical use.

emerging_technologies.name: Agentic Collaborative Networks (ACNs)
emerging_technologies.description: Networks of AI agents that can autonomously coordinate and collaborate to achieve complex goals.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could lead to more efficient decision-making and resource allocation; raises questions about liability and oversight.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will depend on the development of trust mechanisms and interoperability standards; initial adoption in high-impact, low-risk areas.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Personal Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI agents that manage daily tasks, schedule appointments, and provide real-time assistance.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in personal and professional settings, with high integration into smart homes and devices.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Delivery Drones
mainstream_technologies.description: Drones capable of delivering goods autonomously, reducing human involvement in logistics.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Increasingly common in urban and suburban areas, with regulatory frameworks evolving to accommodate their use.

epoch_themes.description: A push towards autonomous systems in every aspect of life, from transport to personal assistance.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Increased efficiency and personalization at the cost of potential job displacement and privacy concerns.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global trend towards urbanization and smart cities, necessitating autonomous solutions for traffic management, logistics, and public services.

epoch_themes.description: A shift towards AI systems that can understand and respond to human emotions, changing the nature of human-machine interaction.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhanced personal interactions but raises ethical questions about manipulation and emotional data privacy.
epoch_themes.global_trends: A focus on mental health, wellness, and personalized experiences, driving the need for emotionally intelligent systems.
